name: Happy & Grumpy
description:
WARNING: This game requires two Xbox Controllers 
(should work with PS4 Controllers as well)

Get your friend and face together the dangers of this infinite dungeon! You will have to kill enemies, defend zones and activate switches to see how far you can go... But who will you choose to be? Happy, the magician, or Grumpy, the swordsman swordsball?

Happy & Grumpy is a game based on cooperation. Happy keeps the distance using his two spells, Generic Purple Magic and The Green Stunt. However, Grumpy gets closer to his enemies using his Mighty Orange Sword and dropping Red Apple-Looking Bombs. You can only hurt the enemies that match those colors, so you must cooperate if you want to stay alive!

We are a small team of four students learning game development. Happy & Grumpy was made in 2 days for a gamejam. They told us we had to do a game about symbionts, so we decided to make this minigame about cooperation.  We are so happy about winning that gamejam, but even happier about having created another game together. We are very passionate about what we do and we'd love to hear your opinion!
